name: Budget Myth
description:
A very mysterious excel/google sheet game.

You are an office worker who works 996 in a big company.

One day at 2 AM you are still working on the budget sheet, your eyes go blurry and you noticed a weird message on the bottom right corner of your sheet.

You need to put "HELP" in B95 to begin.

Here is your budget sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jKz9fSwLQW6TLHdXQkvtYJ8U7oW7jPdM5-q-tyvd...

Design document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11QfCzO4gQ97ysi0311mKuBgySbnAbxYyBGuls-XufLk/...
